text: Despite Keeping Up With the Kardashians crashing in ratings, Kourtney Kardashian and Kim Kardashian still seem to believe that they deserve special treatment. Kim and Kourtney reportedly demanded that the other children at a Color Me Mine store not attend the pottery workshop so North and Penelope could have it all to themselves. A source tells the Enquirer, “ Kim and Kourtney left lotsa tots crying their eyes out. Passersby kept stopping to ask miffed moms what the ruckus was, and one angry lady groused, ‘ Those darn Kardashians had the place shut down, so now we ’ re left out in the cold while our kids have a damn meltdown! ’ ” Although Kim ’ s and Kourtney ’ s reps have already
